tool_description:
Malaysia Overnight Policy Rate (OPR) decided by the Monetary Policy Committee.
Data source from Bank Negara Malaysia, https://www.bnm.gov.my
name: Overnight Policy Rate
title: Overnight Policy Rate

api_list.name: /opr
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://overnight-policy-rate.p.rapidapi.com/opr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "overnight-policy-rate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://overnight-policy-rate.p.rapidapi.com/opr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "overnight-policy-rate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
